      • setDAG

        public void setDAG(DAG dag)
        Description copied from class: PlateuStructure
        Sets the DAG of this PlateuStructure. By default, all parameter variables are set as non-replicated and all non-parameter variables are set as replicated.
        Overrides:
        setDAG in class PlateuStructure
        Parameters:
        dag - the DAG model to be set.
